channel.title: Question About These Forums
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Question About These Forums"

item.title: Re: Question About These Forums
item.content:encoded:
There's no official BvS forum. There's probably two main places that are high traffic. Most new people seem to show up here. The other place people go is Random Village's Forums.

I'll add a recruitment forum, but people are going to post recruitment stuff in the general forum anyway, just because (well, to be honest, because they're annoying).

item.title: Question About These Forums
item.content:encoded:
Is this forum the main forum used by everyone who plays BVS? I'm just curious if there is actually an official forum for this game. Also who is the main moderator for these forums?

Also if I may make a suggestion about "General". It seems cluttered with recruitment posts. Perhaps there should be a recruitment section added?
